# isActive

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether this vertex attribute is active.

## Declaration

```swift
var isActive: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], this attribute is inactive and can be ignored.

## Describing the attribute

- **name**: The name of the attribute.
- **attributeIndex**: The index of the attribute, as declared in Metal shader source code.
- **attributeType**: The data type for the attribute, as declared in Metal shader source code.
- **isPatchControlPointData**: A Boolean value that indicates whether this vertex attribute represents control point data.
- **isPatchData**: A Boolean value that indicates whether this vertex attribute represents patch data.
